content: cup holder mitten interpreted by chialee yeh 10-3-2012 level happy 2 skein of 50g @110-135 yard sport to aran for the pair of mitten #6 to #7 2 circular needles or 4 dpn or needle size as req d by yarn knit one mitten and one fingerless glove for the pair because it can fit either left or right hand wrist size 7 s / 7 5 m / 8 5 l cuff cast on 40 /44 /48 sts put marker at beg of row join and work in the round work 1x1 rib 2 5 /3 /3 5 palm k in the round for 2 5 / 3 /3 5 to reach the point of base of thumb option design adopt any fair isle or ganseys pattern for this part prepare for split compartments start from marker leave the marker here knit 20/22/24 sts continue with the working yarn use back loop cast on method cast on 20/22/24 sts put the rest of 20/22/24 unworked sts on a stitch holder now k in round from marker with the first 20/22/24 sts and those newly cast on sts you may repeat any optional design pattern you adopted for this part of mitten also you can space out the design to repeat 2 to 3 times continue knit in round for 8 / 9 / 9 5 fold piece tube in half it may look like a sock for now the sts on the needle will match the opening left behind graft or sew the 2 most out side edges together first one set of sts is on the holder as you finish these sts you can gradually unfolding the mitten tube opening over to continue graft sew the 2 inside edge sts together note the mitten was never turn inside out while you working on it cup holder mitten interpreted by chialee yeh 10-3-2012 bottom of the cup holder similar to knit the crown of a very small hat start with the corner of split compartments where the marker is pick up 30/ 32/ 36 sts evenly around the opening follow only one line of stacked st to assure those pick up sts not zigzagging mark the beg of row knit and decrease as follow k one row * k4 k2tog repeat * k one row * k3 k2tog repeat * k one row * k2 k2tog repeat* k one row *k2 decrease repeat * thread all remaining sts with a long tail tie end weave in ends fingerless glove put marker at beg of row follow the mitten instruction from cuff to finish knitting the palm section thumb opening from beg of row turn purl one row turn k one row for 1 5 long then join to knit in the round again this will leave you a thumb hole continue knit 2 / c3 decrease 4 sts evenly then knit another 1 5 / 2 bind off you may adjust the length of this portion to fit your
